thread.title: Alia Bhatt Gets 'Goosebumps All Over' After Watching Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Trailer
thread.title_full: Alia Bhatt Gets 'Goosebumps All Over' After Watching Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Trailer

author: @cnnnews18
title: Alia Bhatt Gets 'Goosebumps All Over' After Watching Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Trailer
text:
Alia Bhatt Gets ‘Goosebumps All Over’ After Watching Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava Trailer
Alia Bhatt lauds Vicky Kaushal's Chhaava trailer, calling it 'breathtaking' and admitting it gave her 'goosebumps all over.'
Vicky Kaushal’s much-awaited historical drama Chhaava has been generating buzz ever since its trailer dropped on January 22, 2025. Featuring Rashmika Mandanna and Akshaye Khanna alongside Vicky, the power-packed trailer has received praise from fans and celebrities alike. After Katrina Kaif, Alia Bhatt also shared her thoughts, calling the trailer “breathtaking" and admitting it gave her “goosebumps all over."
Taking to her Instagram stories, Alia shared the trailer and expressed her admiration, writing, “The trailer is absolutely breathtaking. Goosebumps all over. All the best (red heart emoji)," while tagging Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna.
related stories
Earlier, Katrina Kaif, Vicky’s wife, had also praised the trailer on her social media, expressing excitement with, “Outstanding #DineshVijan. This is just (multiple fire emojis)," tagging filmmaker Laxman Utekar, Vicky, Rashmika, and Akshaye.
For those unfamiliar, Chhaava is a historical action film that features Vicky Kaushal in the role of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, while Rashmika Mandanna portrays Maharani Yesubai. Akshaye Khanna takes on the role of Mughal emperor Aurangzeb. The film boasts a stellar ensemble cast, including Ashutosh Rana, Divya Dutta, Vineet Kumar Singh, Diana Penty, and Santosh Juvekar, all in significant roles.
The film, helmed by Laxman Utekar and produced by Dinesh Vijan, promises to bring to life the valor and sacrifice of the Maratha warrior. The grand visuals, intense action sequences, and powerful performances glimpsed in the trailer have left audiences eagerly awaiting the film’s release.
Fans have flooded social media with positive reactions, lauding the film’s production value, Vicky’s commanding presence, and Rashmika’s regal portrayal. Many believe Chhaava will be another milestone in Vicky Kaushal’s career, further cementing his reputation as one of Bollywood’s most versatile actors.
With endorsements from industry stalwarts like Alia Bhatt and Katrina Kaif, the anticipation surrounding Chhaava continues to soar, setting the stage for an epic cinematic experience.
